text: @cnnbrk Right, like Trump's "trade advisor" (who happily followed Trump's "guidance" for coronavirus protections) has any qualifications for attacking CDC efforts. Navarro is more likely to have taken Kushner's "task force" advice that provided little actual coronavirus protections.
